item.title: Wererats
item.description: In Stickyickistan there are many nooks and crannies in which Wererats are known to hide, but they mainly reside in the main sewer system beneath the city streets ...

item.title: Stickyickistan
item.description: Modern Stickyickistan Welcome to the enchanting realm of Stickyickistan, a captivating City State nestled on an island off the Sword Coast, where an active volcano stands proudly ...

item.title: Dwarf
item.description: Dwarves are one of the main species found in the city, but they are a minority. Most dwarves in Stickyickistan come from the Bongstad region, and work as miners in the volcanic rim of Mount Zooka, or as blacksmiths crafting weapons and armor for sale.

item.title: Halflings
item.description: Halflings are one of the main species living in the city, and once were the only humanoid creatures on the island. Halflings in Stickyickistan are everywhere and nowhere at once‚Äîa people both deeply ingrained in the city-state‚Äôs fabric and constantly underestimated.

item.title: Eberron
item.description: Eberron Factions Reimagined for Stickyickistan The Aurum ‚Üí The Gilded Nexus A shadowy organization of wealthy merchants, powerful magitech tycoons, and corrupt nobles ...

item.title: Ravnica
item.description: Ravnican Factions Reimagined for Stickyickistan Azorius Senate ‚Üí Nevercough Tribunal A bureaucratic, law-enforcing body centered in the Capitol building on Nevercough Island ...

item.title: Dragonlance
item.description: Dragonlance Factions Reimagined for Stickyickistan Knights of Solamnia ‚Üí The Nevercough Tribunal Auctoritas Column A strict order of warriors devoted to honor, justice, and law ...

item.title: Upper South Booftown
item.description: The Ashtray Upper South Booftown, better known as ‚ÄúThe Ashtray‚Äù, is where the streets are rough, the air is thick with soot, and the law only exists if you can enforce it yourself ...

item.title: Zooka Mire
item.description: Zooka Mire is a swampy region of The Outback just outside city limits where a small sect of the Golgari Swarm called the Zooka Mire Collective have been operating. ...

item.title: The Outback
item.description: Beyond the sprawling cityscape of Stickyickistan lies The Outback, a vast and untamed wilderness where civilization fades and nature takes hold. A dense, tangled expanse of towering Arcanite-infused trees, hidden rivers, and ancient ruins, it is a land of hermits, cults, and creatures that have never seen the light of day.
